titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relative to the free exercise of religion.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6867-6868)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 6/14/1994--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Prohibits the denial or abridgement by the United States or by any State of the right of U.S. citizens to the free exercise of religion.
